name: Mary CORBIN v. Suresh KHOSLA. Petition of Pennsylvania Association for Justice

parties: Mary CORBIN v. Suresh KHOSLA. Petition of Pennsylvania Association for Justice.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of October, 2010, the Motion for Leave to File Amicus Curiae Brief is GRANTED. The Pennsylvania Association for Justice is directed to file its amicus curiae brief within 21 days of this order.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
6 A.3d 501
Mary CORBIN v. Suresh KHOSLA. Petition of Pennsylvania Association for Justice.
No. 117 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 19, 2010.
